item.title: Self Signed Certification
item.author: thiklife403@gmail.com (Thik)
item.description: តើមានវិធីអ្វីដែលអាចធ្វើ Code Signing ទៅលើ Payload ដែលយើងបានបង្កើតឡើងដោយខ្លួនឯងរួច? ខាងក្រោមនេះគឺជាវិធីដ៏ល្អមួយសម្រាប់ចម្លើយនៃសំនួរខាងលើ៖ Generate the Key 1 2 # Make sure you run as Administrator New-SelfSignedCertificate -DnsName email@yourdomain.com -Type CodeSigning -CertStoreLocation cert:\CurrentUser\My Export Certification Without Private Key 1 Export-Certificate -Cert (Get-ChildItem Cert:\CurrentUser\My -CodeSigningCert)[0] -FilePath code_signing.crt ចំពោះលេខ [0] គឺសម្រាប់ករណីនៅពេលដែលយើងមាន Certificate ច្រើនជាងមួយ។ Import as Trusted Publisher 1 Import-Certificate -FilePath .\code_signing.crt -Cert Cert:\CurrentUser\TrustedPublisher Import as Root Certificate Authority 1 Import-Certificate -FilePath .
item.dc:creator: thik
